description:
Since the founding of my law firm, the Law Offices of John J. Malm & Associates, P.C., I have built a reputation for providing victims in northeastern Illinois with high-quality legal representation as they pursue personal injury compensation. With the opening of my newest office location in Chicago, I can now provide the same outstanding service to the residents of Cook County and the surrounding area. I regularly represent clients' interests in a variety of case types, including:

  • Asbestos and mesothelioma
  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Construction accidents
  • Lead poisoning
  • Nursing home abuse and neglect
  • Products liability
  • Sexual abuse and assault
  • Workers' compensation
  • Wrongful death

Clients who choose my law firm will have a team of three lawyers working for them. My two associates, Jason P. Schneider and Sara L. Ross, are dedicated young attorneys who are quickly building reputations as aggressive litigators and skilled negotiators.

If you or someone you love suffered an injury at the hands of a negligent individual or business, you can turn to my law firm, the Law Offices of John J. Malm & Associates, P.C. We will fight to ensure the protection of your rights as a victim and stand beside you throughout the legal process. By scheduling a free initial consultation at my Chicago law office, you can learn more about how we can help you.
